    • Method Detail

      • connect

        public boolean connect(String ipAddress,
                       int port,
                       Socket socket)
        Connecting client with server using providing address and port.
        Parameters:
        ipAddress - - server ip address
        port - - server port
        socket - - socket to connect on.
        Returns:
        true if success, false on failure

      • run

        public void run()
        Override run method of Runnable interface. Setting name of thread to "Client listen Thread" and start listen loop.
        Specified by:
        run in interface Runnable

      • closeClient

        public void closeClient()
        Closing client, stopping listen thread.

        shotIndex - - index of last shot

      • setEventTrigger

        public void setEventTrigger(javafx.scene.control.Button button)

        Parameters:
        button - - gui handler as button.
